name: scoutapp/scout-apm-symfony-bundle
description: Scout Application Performance Monitoring Agent - https://scoutapm.com

suggest.psr/simple-cache: Set up a service for Psr\SimpleCache\CacheInterface to improve Scout performance
suggest.symfony/orm-pack: If you would like to use Doctrine ORM instrumentation, symfony/orm-pack must be installed
suggest.symfony/twig-pack: If you would like to use Twig instrumentation, symfony/orm-pack must be installed
